nodes.text: The father of Norky was a male individual of the same species as Norky. Norky's father lived with his wife and his son on the Forest Moon of Endor. In 3 ABY, he accompanied his wife and son to deliver the latter to the Ewok Shodu Warrick, where he would spend the day and night until his parents returned. Before he left, the father reminded Norky that he would be back the next day and to mind his manners. Indeed, he returned the day after to pick up Norky.

Norky's father appeared in "Bringing Up Norky," the nineteenth episode in the second season of the animated television series Ewoks. The episode was written by Bob Carrau and Earl Kress, and it premiered on November 22, 1986.
